page.title: 03INTRO. AMENITIES
page.content: families into the area and a large number of single soldiers. Large areas of woodland were cleared although a lot was preserved especially around the married quarters and on the escarpment slopes.The old village church was demolished and a new Army church built on a new site. A new school was also built in addition to the continued use of the old one. Chattenden has only a Post Office and an Off Licence whilst Cliffe Woods has a Post Office,four other shops,a hair_ dressers and a Doctor's surgery.Cliffe Woods also has a Community Centre. Generally,therefore,people living in the survey block have to travel into the Medway towns for their main shopping and also for their entertain- ment.The bus service through the block is restricted to two routes and is very limited especially to Cliffe
